name: AWS DeepRacer
short: A 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning, a type of machine learning, provided by AWS for hands-on learning.
description: AWS DeepRacer is a 1/18th scale autonomous vehicle and an associated online learning program designed to introduce users to reinforcement learning (RL). It is a complete package of a physical race car, a 3D racing simulator, and a global racing league. Users can create RL models in Amazon Sagemaker and train, test and iterate quickly and efficiently. The models are then deployed onto the DeepRacer vehicle for real-world applications. It's a fun, interactive way to learn about machine learning.
